div.pre: 1939 Croton ?, Bruttium, 1927 or earlier (277 part) Burial: 350-300 B.C. Contents: 11+ AR Croton: 9 diob. (1 female hd./Heracles and snakes; 8 Athena hd./club) 2 dr. (Apollo/tripod) Disposition: Reggio (included in no. 1898, Cotron 1927) Kraay, SNR 1970, p. 71 See also no. 1898 above
